description:
Simeon`s Zebstrika participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the fourth match and faced off against Horatio`s Cinccino. The match quickly showcased Horatio`s Cinccino finishing off Simeon`s Zebstrika with Giga Impact to win the battle which allowed Horatio to advance to the second round while Simeon was eliminated from the tournament.
None of Simeon`s Zebstrika moves are known.
name: Zebraika (Shiozaki)
